events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Laura has been assigned to assist with the refund request to ensure prompt service.
Hello! I’m Laura from support. I understand you want a refund because you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with this.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number? This will help speed up the refund process.
Here is the attached photo of the item I got, and my order number is ORD1234567. Please let me know what’s next.
Thank you for the info. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund confirmation.
The refund has been initiated successfully. Please expect the amount back on your original payment method within a few days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund has arrived in my account. Thank you very much for your help and quick resolution.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
